mapper.insert: insert into vam_cart(memberId, bookId, bookCount) values(#{memberId}, #{bookId}, #{bookCount})
mapper.update: update vam_cart set bookCount=#{bookCount} where cartId = #{cartId}
mapper.select: select * from vam_cart where memberId = #{memberId} and bookId = #{bookId}
mapper.delete: delete from vam_cart where memberId = #{memberId} and bookId = #{bookId}
